name: BROEKMAN communications
tag_list: marketing, branding, graphics, design, logos, budgeted-design, champagne-marketing, identity, identity-campaigns, anniversary-campaigns, beer-budget, creative, seo, sem, public-relations, pr, talent-management, direct-mail, style-guides, corporate-marketi
overview:
BROEKMAN communications is a full-service marketing agency. Core Services include: brand management, marketing, corporate communications, public/media relations, identity/anniversary campaigns, event production & corporate sponsorship, start up consulting, business development, website development, graphic design (business cards, flyers, brochures, postcards, reports, social/business collateral), print production, email/viral campaigns, search engine optimization, social media optimization, and web 2.0-friendly online marketing.

:: Roles :: Marketing Director, Sales Director, Business Development Manager, Creative Director, Graphic Designer, or Web Developer.

:: Philosophy :: Campaign marketing on a beer budget. Provide budgeted campaigns utilizing savvy studio branding tactics, corporate marketing & pr initiatives, visionary creative services, and solid business development tools.

:: Entertainment Clients :: Screen Actors Guild Foundation, Focus Features, Columbia Pictures, DreamWorks Animation, New Line, Universal Pictures, ABC TV, Disney Records, J. Paul Getty Center, Storyopolis, Hilton, Congress for the New Urbanism, Green Room/TGR5919 Recording Studios, Jamie Lee Curtis/Harper Collins, North Hollywood Theatre & Arts Festival, International Student Film Festival, Mrs. America Pageant, Fiesta Broadway, Kabbalah Centres International, and Screenblast/Sony Pictures Digital Entertainment.

:: BizDev Clients :: Debibi Strategic Partners (Start-up Marketing & PR Agency); Wealthpoint Equity Ventures Group (identity, locate investors for RE funds); MMACombatClub.com (build company, launch identity/site, build fan base); Pieryon (identity; Direct Mail/PPC programs); SAG Foundation ($5M Capital Campaign); Univ. of Judaism ($1M in Donor Dev.); Pinnacle Estate Properties (Business Development, 2 to 7 offices, 200 to 750 agents); Weintraub Financial Services (RE marketing support); Hilton Corporation (recruitment in hotel training management program); TDGcorp (real estate project management); 310 Development Company (promote GCs for hire); and 3-Bâ€™z Painting (bizdev for commercial painting).
